quote_first: At 8:23 there seemed every chance of a lasting alliance starting between Florin and Guilder. At
quote_last: the two nations were very close to war.
title: The Princess Bride
author: William Goldman

quote_last:
the senior partner walked in.
“I must apologize for keeping you away from your desks,” he began, “but this was not something that I felt could be covered by an internal memo, or slipped into my monthly report.”
title: Sons of Fortune
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: Alex checked his watch as the waitress returned with his order:
quote_last: He planned to enter the building for the first time at 8:55. He looked around the diner and wondered how many of the other customers worked at the bank, and were aware that their new chairman was sitting in one of the booths.
title: Heads You Win
author: Jeffrey Archer
